import{replace}from'lodash';import numeral from'numeral';// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
export function fCurrency(number){return numeral(number).format(Number.isInteger(number)?'$0,0':'$0,0.00');}export function fPercent(number){return numeral(number/100).format('0.0%');}export function fNumber(number){return numeral(number).format();}export function fShortenNumber(number){return replace(numeral(number).format('0.00a'),'.00','');}export function fData(number){return numeral(number).format('0.0 b');}
